channel.title: The Soldiers mouths don't move when they speak.
channel.description: This is something rather bizarre I've noticed with Black Mesa, the soldiers do not move their lips or anything when they speak. For example when a soldier exclaims "No sign of hostiles sir, over!" his mouth remains shut the entire time and makes no indication that he is speaking. They do move their mouth when they say things like "GET DOWN" but it seems that their face posing doesn't cover random, idle chatter.
